titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z242: Ketubah, 1875

notesStmt.note: In poor condition, alot of tape and pink ink added.
The text panel is enclosed in an arch painted with red and green. The text includes the ketubbah, verses from Proverbs 18:22 and Genesis 49:22, and the tna'im. The signatures are calligraphic.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE)
